DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate breast cancer survivor need lose weight able follow weight loss program combine modest calorie restriction graduate activity program..
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility High Levels Energy Expenditure From Physical Activity Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Feasibility assess 1 ) number woman complete 3 -- month program ; 2 ) number woman achieve target amount physical activity per week end program ; 3 ) median amount physical activity achieve group subject complete program .
DOC.criteria: Women < age 71 good general health . Prior diagnosis breast cancer . At least 3 month completion cytotoxic chemotherapy radiation surgery . May continue take endocrine therapy and/or maintenance trastuzumab . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 3045 kg/m2 . By selfassessment , currently perform 60 minute less purposeful exercise per week able walk least 30 minute level surface . Access smart phone capable run MyFitnessPal Garmin Connect apps willing diet exercise data apps view study personnel . Live great Kansas City Metropolitan Area Willing able perform moderate intensity exercise least 5 day per week 3 month . Willing perform unsupervised home exercise entire 3 month . Willing participate weekly behavioral modification group phone call 3 month . Willing participate control dietary intervention portion control meal partial meal track food intake exercise . Use metformin , insulin , steroid weight loss antipsychotic drug within prior 3 week Individuals prior bariatric surgery procedure Need chronic immunosuppressive drug Participation within past 6 month structure weight loss program Weight WatchersÂ® Physical impairment ( bad hip , knee , foot , peripheral neuropathy ) would prohibit perform moderate intensity exercise least 5 day per week . Any condition intercurrent illness opinion investigator make subject poor candidate participation trial recent cardiac event . Currently receive investigational agent clinical trial .
